banner.name: Seize Ideas, Streamline Productivity: Your Notes, Anywhere, Anytime.
uNotes is a note-taking app that helps you capture and prioritize ideas, projects, and to-do lists, so nothing falls through the cracks.

features.title: Filter by topic
features.description: In uNotes, users can effortlessly compose and organize their thoughts by creating notes and seamlessly filtering them based on specific topics, offering a intuitive note-taking experience.

features.title: Customize your notes
features.description: uNotes allows users to customize their notes by adding images, links, and lists, making it easier to express their thoughts and ideas in a more personalized and creative way.

features.title: Access your notes anywhere
features.description: With uNotes, users can access their notes from any device, anywhere, anytime. Whether you are at home, in the office, or on the go, uNotes makes it easy to stay organized and productive.

features.title: Collaborate with others
features.description: In uNotes, users can collaborate with others by sharing notes and notebooks, making it easier to work together and share ideas, whether you are in the same room or on the other side of the world.

features.title: Stay organized
features.description: uNotes offers a variety of features to help users stay organized, including the ability to create notebooks, add tags, and search for notes, making it easier to find and manage notes.

features.title: Stay productive
features.description: uNotes offers a variety of features to help users stay productive, including the ability to set reminders, create to-do lists, and prioritize notes, making it easier to stay on top of tasks.

uNotes offers a variety of features to help users capture, organize, and prioritize their ideas, projects, and to-do lists, so they can stay organized and productive, whether they are at home, in the office, or on the go.

pricing.name: Free
pricing.description: For individuals who want to capture and organize their ideas, projects, and to-do lists.

pricing.name: Premium
pricing.description: For individuals who want to collaborate with others and stay organized and productive.

pricing.name: Business
pricing.description: For teams who want to work together and stay organized and productive.

pricing.heading: Choose the plan that's right for you
pricing.description: uNotes offers a variety of plans to meet the needs of individuals and teams, including a free plan, a premium plan, and a business plan.
